name: Big Truck 4x4 Challenge
description:
Big Truck 4X4 Challenge

I bring to your attention to a new solo developed indie-game "Big Truck 4X4 Challenge".

Big Truck 4X4 Challenge is an all-absorbing attraction for motor racing fans everywhere!

No roads here! You drive an elaborate four runner cross country maneuvering between trees, accelerating up sand dunes, and propelling down river lines…

As a reward for your agility and swiftness, you’ll receive unique car parts and master virtuoso tricks!

  • Several different powerful off-roaders
  • Two types of competition: Sprint and Capture the Flag
  • Excellent 3D graphics
  • Realistic physics
  • Game soundtrack

Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10

Just unzip to your game folder and play!
